channel.title: Manifesto on Aesvoy
channel.description: Recent content in Manifesto on Aesvoy

item.title: Anarchism, Libertarian, Decentralization
item.author: sciredomir@tutanota.com (Mahan)
item.description: This post explores the intersection of anarchism and libertarianism through the lens of decentralization. It examines how both ideologies advocate for individual freedom and skepticism towards centralized authority, highlighting their shared values and differences.

item.title: Done Manifesto
item.author: sciredomir@tutanota.com (Mahan)
item.description: In today’s fast-paced world, getting things done is crucial. The Done manifesto is all about embracing this mindset and applying it to your work.
